Response: Menstruation, also known as a period, is part of the menstrual cycle when a woman bleeds from her vagina for a few days. For most women this happens every 28 days. but it's common for periods to be more or less frequent than this, ranging from day 21 to day 40 of their menstrual cycle

Un ke mahvari 21 din se le kar 40 din tak hosakta hai

Response: A period happens because of changes in hormones in the body. Hormones are chemical messengers. The ovaries release the female hormones estrogen and progesterone . These hormones cause the lining of the uterus (or womb) to build up. The built-up lining is ready for a fertilized egg to attach to and start developing. If there is no fertilized egg, the lining breaks down and bleeds. Then the same process happens all over again.

haiz, jisay period bhi kaha jata hai, mahvari ka hissa hai jab aurat ki andaam nihani/vagina se kuch dinon tak khoon aata hai. ziyada tar khawateen ke liye yeh har 28 din mein hota hai. lekin mahvari ka is se ziyada ya kam kasrat se hona aik aam baat hai. Un ke mahvari 21 din se le kar 40 din tak hosakta hai

mahvari jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progesterone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daani ( ya reham ) ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. blt up Aster fertilised anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to Aster toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

Intent (Roman Urdu): kya mujhe ispe sharam aani chahiye?
Response (Roman Urdu): mein samjhti hon ke aap kaisa mehsoos kar rahay hain. mahvari har aurat ke liye mamool ki baat hai. is mein sharminda honay ki koi baat nahi hai. mein aap ke cycle ke baray mein aap ke kisi bhi sawal mein aap ki madad karne ke liye haazir hon .

Intent (Roman Urdu): aur ye mujhe ganda lagta hai
Response (Roman Urdu): aap ko apni mahvari ke douran ganda mehsoos karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. haiz qudrati hai .

Intent (Roman Urdu): kya mai aapse mahvari ke hawale se sawaal pooch sakti hun
Response (Roman Urdu): haan tum kar satke ho! barah karam mahvari se mutaliq koi sawal ya masla jo aap ko darpaish ho usay share karen .

Intent (Roman Urdu): mujhe mahwaari ke qareeb kamar mai dard shuru hojata hai
Response (Roman Urdu): kamar dard mahvari ki aik aam alamat hai .

Intent (Roman Urdu): kya aam tor paar aurton ko mahvari ke qareeb kamar mai dard hota hai?
Response (Roman Urdu): kamar mein halka dard mamool ki baat hai aur yeh mahvari ki alamat hai .

mahvari se pehlay ya is ke douran aap ko mandarja zail alamaat ho sakti hain jin mein aphaara/bloating, dard, qabz, ishaal, mahasay, andaam nihani/vagina se kharij honay wala madah, sir dard, khanay ki khwahish, mood mein tabdeeli, aur naram chhaati shaamil hain .
